text:
When you click once on the ApacheMonitor icon in the toolbar under Win2k, a 
small menu pops up with the loaded servers listed (I have two version running). 
When mouse-over a server that is running and select "Stop", it fails to do 
anything. If you double click and popup the dialog box and stop it from there, 
it works fine, however.
creator: wizard@neonedge.com

text:
Please try version 2.0.36.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7930 ***
creator: slive@apache.org
